headline: The Most Important Investment Lessons I've Ever Shared

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Texas Pacific Land (TPL) Record Revenues, Major Basin Acquisition and Stock Split
summary: Texas Pacific Land Corporation recently reported record third-quarter 2025 revenues of US$203.09 million, completed a US$474 million acquisition of 17,300 net royalty acres in the Midland Basin, secured a US$500 million revolving credit facility, and announced a 3-for-1 stock split expected in December 2025. The company also achieved record water sales, closed on its inaugural credit facility to enhance liquidity, and continues to expand its portfolio, underscoring a period of significant...
